Package datamodel

Class TrainingModel<T>

java.lang.Object
datamodel.TrainingModel<T>
Type Parameters:
T - A generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataModel<T>
public class TrainingModel<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataModel<T>
A class that implements the DataModel interface. This particular model is very useful for a treeAugmentedNaiveBayes classifier.
Since:
2020-05-06
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
DataModel, TreeAugmentedNayveBayes

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Category<T>[] categories
    A list of categories, with their respective counts and information.
    protected Classification<T> classes
    A list of classifications with their respective labels, etc
    protected int N
    The total number of examples extracted from training data
    protected double N_plica
    The Laplace Smoothing term to be used with this data

    • N

      protected int N
      The total number of examples extracted from training data

    • N_plica

      protected final double N_plica
      The Laplace Smoothing term to be used with this data
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • categories

      protected Category<T>[] categories
      A list of categories, with their respective counts and information. Example X1 and its counts for Nijkc, Nikc, Nijc, the labels,...
      See Also:
      Category

    • classes

      protected Classification<T> classes
      A list of classifications with their respective labels, etc
      See Also:
      Classification

      public int getNumClasses()
      A method that returns the number of classes that the DataModel can assume. Example: Class can vary from: 0 - 19 - In that case the method should return 20
      Specified by:
      getNumClasses in interface DataModel<T>
      Returns:

      An int with the number of occurences of that combination
